text: Gerry Bednob (born May 18, 1950) is an American actor and comedian of Indo Trinidadian heritage. Gerry starred as Bling Bling Shelton in Free Radio on VH1 from 2008 to 2009. He had a role in the 2010 movie Furry Vengeance, with Brendan Fraser and Brooke Shields, playing Mr. Gupta. He is also the uncle of Michelle Jhagroo. He also appeared in The 40-Year-Old Virgin. ==Other websites== * *Gerry Bednob homepage *Gerry Bednob will tell you what to do with a goat - Official MySpace page *Gerry Bednob official Facebook page - Official Facebook page Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:African-American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:trinidad and Tobago people
title: Gerry Bednob
